definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: This book fills a major gap in lexicography.
sentences.chinese: 這本書填補了詞典學方面的重大缺門。

sentences.english: This paper is a study in the field of theoretical lexicography.
sentences.chinese: 本屬於理論詞典學研究的範疇。
